column4: we saw you the first time, ardithoxha - and we're trying to help you. Please be patient with us :)
you need to reboot your machine, and when you start, before ubuntu loads, you will need to press whichever key your PC says for System Setup, it's usually Escape, F1 or F2
You just have to look for the right part of the BIOS where you enable and disable hardware, ardithoxha
I can't tell you where that is, all BIOS's are different
if you find your onboard sound disabled, enable it.
Yes
You have to check that the sound card is enabled in the BIOS
Do I have any contact with what, ardithoxha? :)
Here, you get it for free. Be happy :)
yes
